product_name: Planet Bike Red Zeppelin CO2 Tire Inflator Head
long_description: The Planet Bike Red Zeppelin CO2 Tire Inflator Head inflates in a flash and offers a compact design you can stash in a saddle pack or backpack. Precision-machined body and head with Airflation Control(TM) knob for easy adjustment. Fits Presta and Schrader valves without adapters. The Planet Bike Red Zeppelin CO2 Tire Inflator Head is compatible with threaded cartridges (cartridges sold separately).
short_description: The Planet Bike Red Zeppelin CO2 Tire Inflator Head inflates in a flash and offers a compact design you can stash in a saddle pack or backpack.
